Package webd4201.hinbestd

Class User

java.lang.Object
webd4201.hinbestd.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollegeInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Faculty, Student
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollegeInterface
The user class, which is used to implement the CollegeInterface and is the super class for different types of users (Faculty, Students)
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User​(long id, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String emailAddress, java.util.Date lastAccess, java.util.Date enrolDate, boolean enabled, char type) throws InvalidUserDataException
      The parameterized constructor - accepts the instance variables and assigns the data to the variables with the mutators
      Parameters:
      id - The ID number of the user
      password - The user's password
      firstName - The user's first name
      lastName - The user's last name
      emailAddress - The user's email address
      lastAccess - The last time the user signed in
      enrolDate - The date the user enrolled
      enabled - Sets the user's accessibility
      type - The user type (Student or Faculty)
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException - thrown when user data is invalid

    • User

      public User() throws InvalidUserDataException
      Default constructor - creates a new instance of the User class with the default values from the constants
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException - thrown when user data is invalid
